Author: greencoconutwater
Text: This did actually help thank you so much!! I'll definitely be way more okay with broader terms like those!! I appreciate it

Author: omnav22
Text: I'm sorry this is happening... my bf does something kind of similar. Would it be worth asking him not to comment on specific parts of your body? Maybe just limited to more broad terms, that could describe you inside too, like "beautiful" (or when getting it on, "sexy", etc.) It's difficult to describe to a partner when confidence fluctuates so dramatically :/ this might not have helped very much, but I def feel you!!! This hit hard
